pr_title: Fix javadoc jar generation and javadoc building

timeline.message:
Update build.gradle for testing

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Based on the title of the PR, this has no relation to the build.gradle
However the name of the branch you used  liachmodded:fix/javadoc-build makes me think this is to fix javadoc.
So I would say either change the name of the PR to mention the whole picture or scope the javadoc fixes to another PR
timeline.author: i509VCB
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,8 +24,8 @@ * *

For the current list of types, check with {@link Tag#TYPES}. * - * @see CompoundTag#containsKey(String, int) - * @see Tag#idToString(int) + * @see CompoundTag#contains(String, int)

replies.bodyText: Oh, this pr fixes javadoc jar generation and javadoc building
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: We don't need to fully qualify this do we?
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: because importing it would cause a checkstyle error
replies.author: liach

timeline.author: i509VCB
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,7 +43,7 @@ /** * Get the tint color for a fluid being rendered at a given position. * - * @note As of right now, our hook cannot handle setting a custom alpha + *

Note: As of right now, our hook cannot handle setting a custom alpha

replies.bodyText: Just use this for now, this works well and doclint doesn't know @note
replies.author: liach
